channel.title: vlc does not work and does not play anything
channel.description:
hello, this is the first time I use whonix and I have a problem. The problem is that the VLC player does not work, nothing plays back MP4 and other formats.
What I can do?
thanks

item.title: vlc does not work and does not play anything
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
entr0py:

To figure out if it’s a Whonix-specific issue (and if you trust the media file), try to play it on a non-Whonix VM, such as plain Debian.

Right. And I like to add: ideally in a non-networked VM.

singlecolt:

How to install another video player?

Same as for any Debian based Linux distribution as per https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Free_Support_Principle.

Read full topic
item.source: vlc does not work and does not play anything

item.title: vlc does not work and does not play anything

item.description:
no longer I understand anything. Some videos work and others do not, wtf

How to install another video player?

Read full topic
item.source: vlc does not work and does not play anything

item.title: vlc does not work and does not play anything
item.dc:creator: entr0py
item.description:
If there is no helpful information in the terminal and you can’t fix it yourself, then the next step is to get help.

We are not VLC experts here so if it’s not a Whonix-specific issue, it would more useful for you to post in a VLC support forum.

To figure out if it’s a Whonix-specific issue (and if you trust the media file), try to play it on a non-Whonix VM, such as plain Debian.

singlecolt:

By commands I have the same problem.

Unless you post more specific information, it’s hard to give you any more specific advice. (You can get more information by typing vlc --verbose=2 yourfile.mp4)

singlecolt:

which fall directly if you let me see it. ( the downloaded MP4 directly if they work)

I don’t understand this statement. Can you try saying it differently?

Read full topic
item.source: vlc does not work and does not play anything

item.title: vlc does not work and does not play anything
item.dc:creator: singlecolt
item.description:
Thank you. By commands I have the same problem.

I’ve been trying things and I realized one thing.

The videos can not see are extracted from zip / rar, which fall directly if you let me see it. ( the downloaded MP4 directly if they work)

it may be for the unrar? I do not know what else to do

Thanks again.

Read full topic
item.source: vlc does not work and does not play anything

item.title: vlc does not work and does not play anything
item.dc:creator: entr0py
item.description:
singlecolt:

What I can do?

Generally, the first step in troubleshooting is obtaining helpful debugging information / error messages.

To do that, either find program-specific logs, or try running the program in a terminal.

Open Konsole, type vlc yourfile.mp4
Read / post what it says.

Read full topic

thanks
